column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Aside from waiting in line for about half an hour to put in our order
column2: our overall experience at this place was perfect. Their baked goods were phenomenal.  We ordered a few pastries but making the decision was pretty tough given the beautiful selection of pastries
column3: cakes and macaroons.  The coffee was especially good and the cortado was incredible. The only thing I would have done differently
column4: is that i would have asked for my pastries to be slightly warmed up.
